Main projects

Explore our cutting-edge projects, designed to drive progress and innovation.

KYDO revolutionizes document management with secure storage, easy sharing, and seamless integration. Access your data anytime, anywhere, with encryption ensuring safety. KYDO adapts to your workflow, making document handling effortless. Data is securely stored in Switzerland.

KYDO

  • KEEP YOUR DATA ORGANIZED

Stay organized with PINIT! Upload documents easily via Drag & Drop, our scanning app, or email. Process and approve receipts quickly. Integrate your POS system for automatic income and payment recording. Automate your cash book to save time and reduce errors, so you can focus on your business.

PINIT

  • GASTRONOMY ACCOUNTING MADE EASY

Our web app optimizes routes and ensures timely pickups and drop-offs for transports. It provides real-time updates, reduces travel time, and enhances safety. Focus on your core business while our technology handles logistics.

Employees Aquarium

We chose the jellyfish as our company logo because all of its filaments, moving in a gentle and harmonious way, are reminiscent of all the connections in the digital world and the way we want to manage them: gently and harmoniously.

From this concept comes the name of our company: Eutima. This name refers to a genus of jellyfish, known for its transparency and slender tentacles.

This is the reason why the jellyfish is often present in our ecosystem and also the reason why you can discover our employees through our employees aquarium. Don't hesitate to click on us, drag us or pull our filaments!

GO TO OUR AQUARIUM!
×
